messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] dog food was cutting fabric was responsibility etc.
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/14/2003 9:48:07 PM Central Standard Time, danielle.conger@comcast.net writes: My puppy has turned into quite the shedder! (Lab/ Springer
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/14/2003 9:48:07 PM Central Standard Time,
danielle.conger@... writes:
My puppy has
turned into quite the shedder! (Lab/ Springer Spaniel rescue puppy) I swear
I could follow her around all day with the vacuum. Three little ones and a
shedding dog--yes, vacuuming is "my" hang up. Doesn't have to be done
everyday, but two days+ and it's just disgusting! Tumbling tumbleweeds have
nothing on us!
~~~

You might want to try the Nutro food that is designed to cut down on
shedding. It worked for us!

Tuck


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
